original_title: Little Pim: Feelings - Chinese for Kids
overview: See Little Pim and friends feel happy and in love, make sad and mad faces and everything in between. Children will learn more than 60 Chinese words and phrases to show their feelings! Little Pim is a fun, award-winning series designed to introduce foreign languages to toddlers and preschoolers. Feelings features Little Pim, a lovable, animated panda who teaches Chinese to children through a combination of animation, and live action of real kids doing everyday activities.Make sure you check out our five other Chinese episodes from Little Pim! Little Pim is also available in other languages.
tagline: See Little Pim and friends feel happy and in love, make sad and mad faces and everything in between. Children will learn more than 60 Chinese words and phrases to show their feelings!
title: Little Pim: Feelings - Chinese for Kids
